channel.title: Huge help please, connecting to 639 servers and clients
channel.description:
i've been trying to switch over to a 639/672 server, im trying to get onto humidityx source right now. ive changed all '127.0.0.1' to my ip, and also have changed the ip in 'clientsettings' to my ip.
i have done this with loads of server sources and clients, why can i connect to any of them?
yes my ip is portfrowarded, and am using 43594.
:S

item.title: Huge help please, connecting to 639 servers and clients
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

because no-ip is for the others to connect switch it back to 127.0.0.1 and you should be able to login

Read full topic
item.source: Huge help please, connecting to 639 servers and clients
